name: Notabug. Dark Pastel
description:
Hey! I'm here to port my userstyle to more websites. With the 8chan userstyle having 300+ installs, and the reddit userstyle having 181 installs, I figured that "Hey! People like these colors!". So now I'm here to port it to this weird reddit alternative called Notabug. 

Credit to the color choices all go to /u/dudinacas, with his reddit sync theme being: https://redd.it/6fjms0
